languages.text: {n}Абеляр не то фыркает, не то кашляет при последних словах Урбенда. Губернатор бросает на сенешаля взгляд, который Версериан встречает с самым невозмутимым видом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр не то фыркает, не то кашляет при последних словах Урбенда. Губернатор бросает на сенешаля взгляд, который Версериан встречает с самым невозмутимым видом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр не то фыркает, не то кашляет при последних словах Урбенда. Губернатор бросает на сенешаля взгляд, который Версериан встречает с самым невозмутимым видом.{/n}

{n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}
{n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}厄本说出最后一句话之后，阿贝拉德“嗯”了一声，既像是轻蔑的哼声，又像是咳嗽。厄本看了阿贝拉德一眼，但阿贝拉德脸上没有流露出任何表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本说出最后一句话之后，阿贝拉德“嗯”了一声，既像是轻蔑的哼声，又像是咳嗽。厄本看了阿贝拉德一眼，但阿贝拉德脸上没有流露出任何表情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ante las últimas palabras de Urbend, Abelard suelta un sonido que podría interpretarse como un resoplido o un a tos. Urbend lo mira, pero Abelard responde con total indiferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante las últimas palabras de Urbend, Abelard suelta un sonido que podría interpretarse como un resoplido o un a tos. Urbend lo mira, pero Abelard responde con total indiferencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーベントの最後の言葉を聞いたアベラルドは、嘲笑をこめた鼻息とも咳払いともいえる音を出した。アーベントが彼の方へ視線を送るとアベラルドは実に無関心げに彼を見つめ返した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アーベントの最後の言葉を聞いたアベラルドは、嘲笑をこめた鼻息とも咳払いともいえる音を出した。アーベントが彼の方へ視線を送るとアベラルドは実に無関心げに彼を見つめ返した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bei Urbends letzten Worten entgleitet Abelard ein Geräusch, das sich entweder als Schnauben oder als Husten deuten lässt. Urbend wirft ihm einen Blick zu, dem Abelard mit völliger Ungeniertheit begegnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei Urbends letzten Worten entgleitet Abelard ein Geräusch, das sich entweder als Schnauben oder als Husten deuten lässt. Urbend wirft ihm einen Blick zu, dem Abelard mit völliger Ungeniertheit begegnet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À ces mots, Abélard laisse échapper un bruit qui pourrait aussi bien être interprété comme une simple toux que comme un grognement de dédain. Quoi qu'il en soit, le sénéchal affiche un air d'une parfaite nonchalance quand Urbend se tourne vers lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À ces mots, Abélard laisse échapper un bruit qui pourrait aussi bien être interprété comme une simple toux que comme un grognement de dédain. Quoi qu'il en soit, le sénéchal affiche un air d'une parfaite nonchalance quand Urbend se tourne vers lui.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Urbend'in son söylediklerinin üzerine Abelard hem hafif bir gülüş hem de öksürük olarak tanımlanabilecek bir ses çıkarıyor. Urbend ona bakış atıyor, Abelard ise bu bakışa mutlak derecede kayıtsız bir ifadeyle karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At Urbend's last words, Abelard lets out a sound that could be interpreted as either a snort or a cough. Urbend gives him a look, which Abelard meets with an expression of utter nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend'in son söylediklerinin üzerine Abelard hafif bir gülümseme olarak da, bir öksürük olarak da tanımlanabilecek bir ses çıkarıyor. Urbend ona bir bakış atıyor, Abelard ise bu bakışlara mutlak derecede kayıtsız bir ifadeyle karşılık veriyor.{/n}
